about: Template for tracking issues in DevLake for DORA metrics.
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

# Tipo de Issue
Seleccione el tipo de issue:
- [ ] feat
- [ ] feature
- [ ] proposal
- [ ] requirement
- [ ] bug
- [ ] broken
- [ ] incident
- [ ] failure

# Prioridad del Issue
Indique la prioridad:
- [ ] highest
- [ ] high
- [ ] medium
- [ ] low
- [ ] p0
- [ ] p1
- [ ] p2
- [ ] p3

# Componente del Issue
Marque el componente afectado:
- [ ] frontend
- [ ] backend
- [ ] api
- [ ] base de datos
- [ ] infraestructura
- [ ] otro

# Severidad del Issue
Indique la severidad:
- [ ] severity(blocker)
- [ ] severity(critical)
- [ ] severity(major)
- [ ] severity(minor)
- [ ] severity(trivial)

# Descripción
Proporcione una descripción detallada del issue:
